mapper.insert: insert into member( member_no, member_email, member_pw, member_nick, member_name, member_gender, member_birth, member_phone, member_mbti, member_animal, member_interest1, member_interest2, member_interest3, member_place1, member_place2, member_place3 ) values( #{memberNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNick}, #{memberName}, #{memberGender}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberMbti}, #{memberAnimal}, #{memberInterest1}, #{memberInterest2}, #{memberInterest3}, #{memberPlace1}, #{memberPlace2}, #{memberPlace3} )
mapper.select: select * from member order by member_no
mapper.update: update member set member_club_count = member_club_count - 1 where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_NICK, m.MEMBER_GENDER, m.MEMBER_PHONE, m.MEMBER_BIRTH, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_MBTI, m.MEMBER_ANIMAL, m.MEMBER_INTEREST1, m.MEMBER_INTEREST2, m.MEMBER_INTEREST3, m.MEMBER_PLACE1, m.MEMBER_PLACE2, m.MEMBER_PLACE3, m.MEMBER_ADMIN, m.MEMBER_REPORT_COUNT, m.MEMBER_CLUB_COUNT, m.MEMBER_SNS_ID, m.MEMBER_LOGINDATE, mp.MEMBER_NO member_no2, mp.ATTACH_NO attach_no2 FROM MEMBER m LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_PROFILE mp ON m.MEMBER_NO = mp.MEMBER_NO WHERE m.member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.insert: insert into blocked (blocked_no, blocked_target, blocked_user) values (#{blockedNo}, #{blockedTarget}, #{blockedUser})
mapper.select: SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_NICK, m.MEMBER_GENDER, m.MEMBER_PHONE, m.MEMBER_BIRTH, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_MBTI, m.MEMBER_ANIMAL, m.MEMBER_INTEREST1, m.MEMBER_INTEREST2, m.MEMBER_INTEREST3, m.MEMBER_PLACE1, m.MEMBER_PLACE2, m.MEMBER_PLACE3, m.MEMBER_ADMIN, m.MEMBER_REPORT_COUNT, m.MEMBER_CLUB_COUNT, m.MEMBER_SNS_ID, m.MEMBER_LOGINDATE, cm.*, c.*, cl.*, cc.* FROM MEMBER m LEFT OUTER JOIN CLUB_MEMBER cm ON m.member_no = cm.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN club c ON cm.CLUB_NO = c.CLUB_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN club_like cl ON m.MEMBER_NO = cl.MEMBER_NO AND cm.CLUB_NO = cl.CLUB_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cm.club_no, count(*) club_member_count FROM CLUB_MEMBER cm WHERE club_member_permission = 1 GROUP BY club_no) cc ON c.CLUB_NO = cc.club_no WHERE m.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY cl.CLUB_LIKE_NO DESC, cm.CLUB_MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_NICK, m.MEMBER_GENDER, m.MEMBER_PHONE, m.MEMBER_BIRTH, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_MBTI, m.MEMBER_ANIMAL, m.MEMBER_INTEREST1, m.MEMBER_INTEREST2, m.MEMBER_INTEREST3, m.MEMBER_PLACE1, m.MEMBER_PLACE2, m.MEMBER_PLACE3, m.MEMBER_ADMIN, m.MEMBER_REPORT_COUNT, m.MEMBER_CLUB_COUNT, m.MEMBER_SNS_ID, m.MEMBER_LOGINDATE, mb.MEMBER_NO member_no5, mb.MBTI_BOARD_NO, mb.MBTI_BOARD_TITLE, mb.MBTI_BOARD_TIME, mbl.MBTI_BOARD_NO mbti_board_no2, mbl.MEMBER_NO member_no6, mbv.MBTI_BOARD_NO mbti_board_no3, mbv.MEMBER_NO member_no7, mbv.VOTE_CHOICE_NO, count(mbl2.MBTI_BOARD_NO) like_count2 FROM MEMBER m LEFT OUTER JOIN MBTI_BOARD mb ON m.MEMBER_NO = mb.MEMBER_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MBTI_BOARD_LIKE mbl ON m.MEMBER_NO = mbl.MEMBER_NO AND mb.MBTI_BOARD_NO = mbl.MBTI_BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MBTI_BOARD_VOTE mbv ON m.MEMBER_NO = mbv.MEMBER_NO AND mb.MBTI_BOARD_NO = mbv.MBTI_BOARD_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MBTI_BOARD_LIKE mbl2 ON mb.MBTI_BOARD_NO = mbl2.MBTI_BOARD_NO WHERE m.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} GROUP BY m.MEMBER_NO, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_NICK, m.MEMBER_GENDER, m.MEMBER_PHONE, m.MEMBER_BIRTH, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_MBTI, m.MEMBER_ANIMAL, m.MEMBER_INTEREST1, m.MEMBER_INTEREST2, m.MEMBER_INTEREST3, m.MEMBER_PLACE1, m.MEMBER_PLACE2, m.MEMBER_PLACE3, m.MEMBER_ADMIN, m.MEMBER_REPORT_COUNT, m.MEMBER_CLUB_COUNT, m.MEMBER_SNS_ID, m.MEMBER_LOGINDATE, mb.MEMBER_NO, mb.MBTI_BOARD_NO, mb.MBTI_BOARD_TITLE, mb.MBTI_BOARD_TIME, mbl.MBTI_BOARD_NO, mbl.MEMBER_NO, mbv.MBTI_BOARD_NO, mbv.MEMBER_NO, mbv.VOTE_CHOICE_NO ORDER BY mbv.vote_choice_no DESC, mb.MBTI_BOARD_NO ASC

select B.*, Y.member_nick from Blocked B left outer join Member Y on B. blocked_target = Y.member_no left outer join Member M on B.blocked_user = M.member_no where M.member_no = #{blockedUser} order by blocked_no
select * from Blocked B left outer join Member Y on B. blocked_target = Y.member_no where B.blocked_no = #{blockedNo}
